resources.string: For any inquiries or support, please\ncontact us at melihcandemir@protonmail.com

ArtBook is a user-friendly application designed for art lovers to easily catalog and manage their favorite artworks. Featuring a simple and intuitive interface, this app allows users to add, view, and organize artwork details, including the artist\'s name, year, and a photo of the piece. Whether you want to explore famous masterpieces or keep a digital archive of your personal favorites, ArtBook offers a seamless way to maintain your own art collection. Effortlessly browse, edit, or delete entries, making it the perfect companion for both casual art enthusiasts and serious collectors.
